consent.title: Research Participation Consent
consent.description: You are invited to participate in a research study conducted by Dubai Health in collaboration with our research partner, Virufy.Before you decide, please carefully review the official study documents. Your participation is voluntary.
consent.dubaiHealthTitle: Dubai Health - Participant Information & Consent Form:
consent.dubaiHealthDesc: Explains the study's purpose, procedures, risks, and benefits.
consent.virufyDesc: Explains how Virufy handles your data.
consent.readFull: Click to read the full document
consent.confirmationDesc: By checking the boxes below, you confirm you have reviewed the information and agree to participate.
consent.checkbox1: I certify that I am 18 years of age or older.
consent.checkbox2: I have read and understood the Dubai Health Participant Information & Consent Form.
consent.checkbox3: I acknowledge that my anonymized data will be shared with Virufy for analysis and that I have reviewed their Privacy Policy.
consent.checkbox4: I explicitly consent to the collection and processing of my health information and recordings (cough, breathing, speech).
